name: E-Commerce Platform Launch
notes: Launch campaign for new e-commerce platform targeting Gen Z shoppers in Thailand. Focus on mobile-first experience and social commerce

name: Performance Suite Q1 2024
notes: Summer promotion for Adapter Digital's performance marketing suite. Targeting marketing managers and agencies

name: CDP Awareness Campaign
notes: Long-running campaign promoting Customer Data Platform solutions for enterprise clients. Focus on B2B decision makers

name: Gen Z Social Commerce Test
notes: Campaign paused due to low engagement - testing new creative formats for Gen Z audience on TikTok and Instagram

name: Mid-Year SaaS Promotion
notes: Promoting SaaS marketing tools to Millennial marketing professionals. Focus on LinkedIn and Facebook

notes: Valentine's Day e-commerce campaign targeting Gen Z couples. Heavy focus on Instagram and TikTok

name: Q2 Enterprise Marketing Tools
notes: Enterprise-focused campaign for Adapter Digital's marketing automation platform. Targeting CMOs and marketing directors

name: Back to School E-Commerce
notes: Back to school campaign for online study supplies. Targeting Gen Z students and parents on Facebook and TikTok

name: Fall Fashion Collection
notes: Fall fashion collection launch for Bangkok-based fashion brand. Targeting Millennials on Instagram and Facebook

name: Halloween E-Commerce Campaign
notes: Halloween-themed e-commerce campaign for Gen Z audience. Focus on TikTok viral content and Instagram stories
